short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This will switch the purple 'Subscribe' button to a bright orange when your free subscription is ready to be used

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This is an alternative to the "Prime Subscription and Loot Reminder Extension" inside twitch.tv that you can enable for your favorite streamer.
